- q represents a [quadruped](/wiki/Quadruped "Quadruped"):

  - q [rothe](/wiki/Rothe "Rothe")
  - q [mumak](/wiki/Mumak "Mumak")
  - q [leocrotta](/wiki/Leocrotta "Leocrotta")
  - q [wumpus](/wiki/Wumpus "Wumpus")
  - q [titanothere](/wiki/Titanothere "Titanothere")
  - q [baluchitherium](/wiki/Baluchitherium "Baluchitherium")
  - q [mastodon](/wiki/Mastodon "Mastodon")

* Q represents the quantum mechanic [monster class](/wiki/Monster_class "Monster class"):
  - Q [quantum mechanic](/wiki/Quantum_mechanic "Quantum mechanic")

- Press [q]() to [quaff](/wiki/Quaff "Quaff") a [potion](/wiki/Potion "Potion") or from a [fountain](/wiki/Fountain "Fountain") or [sink](/wiki/Sink "Sink")
- Press [shift](/wiki/Shift "Shift") + [q]() to [quiver](/wiki/Quiver "Quiver") items for [firing](/wiki/Firing "Firing")

*The following information pertains to an upcoming version ([NetHack 3.7.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.7.0 "NetHack 3.7.0")). If this version is now released, please verify that it is still accurate, then update the page to incorporate this information.*

[Genetic engineers](/wiki/Genetic_engineer "Genetic engineer") will also be Q.

## SLASH'EM

[SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM") introduces new creatures that use the q and Q glyphs:

- q quadruped:

  - q [lamb](/wiki/Lamb "Lamb")
  - q [giant badger](/wiki/Giant_badger "Giant badger")
  - q [scramper](/wiki/Scramper "Scramper")
  - q [sheep](/wiki/Sheep "Sheep")
  - q [goat](/wiki/Goat "Goat")
  - q [squealer](/wiki/Squealer "Squealer")
  - q [cow](/wiki/Cow "Cow")
  - q [mangler](/wiki/Mangler "Mangler")
  - q [bull](/wiki/Bull "Bull")
  - q [Jumbo the Elephant](/wiki/Jumbo_the_Elephant "Jumbo the Elephant")
  - q [juggernaut](/wiki/Juggernaut "Juggernaut")
  - q [catoblepas](/wiki/Catoblepas "Catoblepas")

* Q engineers:

  - Q [genetic engineer](/wiki/Genetic_engineer "Genetic engineer")
  - Q [Doctor Frankenstein](/wiki/Doctor_Frankenstein "Doctor Frankenstein")

[![This article has been updated to reflect NetHack 3.6.6. Click here for more information.](/images/5/57/Nh366-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article has been updated to reflect NetHack 3.6.6. Click here for more information.")

Q

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
Printable ASCII characters
~ ! @ # $ % ^ & * ( ) _ + space
` 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 0 - = { } |
Qq Ww Ee Rr Tt Yy Uu Ii Oo Pp : " [ ] \
Aa Ss Dd Ff Gg Hh Jj Kk Ll ? ; ' Ctrl
Zz Xx Cc Vv Bb Nn Mm , . / < > Alt
  • q represents a quadruped:
    • q rothe
    • q mumak
    • q leocrotta
    • q wumpus
    • q titanothere
    • q baluchitherium
    • q mastodon
  • Q represents the quantum mechanic monster class:
    • Q quantum mechanic
  • Press q to quaff a potion or from a fountain or sink
  • Press shift + q to quiver items for firing

The following information pertains to an upcoming version (NetHack 3.7.0). If this version is now released, please verify that it is still accurate, then update the page to incorporate this information.

Genetic engineers will also be Q.

SLASH'EM

SLASH'EM introduces new creatures that use the q and Q glyphs:

  • q quadruped:
    • q lamb
    • q giant badger
    • q scramper
    • q sheep
    • q goat
    • q squealer
    • q cow
    • q mangler
    • q bull
    • q Jumbo the Elephant
    • q juggernaut
    • q catoblepas
  • Q engineers:
    • Q genetic engineer
    • Q Doctor Frankenstein
